Notification.Name: Notify-ContractExpiration-21DayNotice
Notification.Subject: Reminder: Extend Your USS Fence Contract
Notification.column:
Hi ((SOOrder_customerID_description)), 

 

Your fence rental contract for is set to end on ((SOOrder_usrNVRTScheduledEndDate)). 

Project Name: ((JobSite_descr)) 

Address: ((JobAddr_addressLine1)) ((JobAddr_city)) ((JobAddr_state)) ((JobAddr_postalCode))

Order Number: ((SOOrder_orderType)) ((SOOrder_orderNbr))

 

To extend your contract or make any changes, contact us: 

  • Call: 866-536-9161 

  • Email: ordersupport@unitedsiteservicesinc.com  

 

Our team is ready to help. 

 

If you have already spoken with your sales executive and finalized the next steps for your fence contract, please disregard this email. 

 

 

Thank you for choosing United Site Services. 

 

Sincerely, 
The United Site Services Team

AUSchedule.LastRunResult: The operation has been completed successfully.
